member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddCheckButton
member.summary: Adds a check button (check box) to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the check button to add.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the button text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
A BOOL indicating the current state of the check button. TRUE if checked; FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddComboBox
member.summary: Adds a combo box to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the combo box to add.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddControlItem
member.summary: Adds an item to a container control in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control to which the item is to be added.
The ID of the item.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the item's text, which can be either a label or, in the case of a drop-down list, the item itself. This text is a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddEditBox
member.summary: Adds an edit box control to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the edit box to add.
A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that provides the default text displayed in the edit box.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddMenu
member.summary: Adds a menu to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the menu to add.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the menu name as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddPushButton
member.summary: Adds a button to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the button to add.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the button text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddRadioButtonList
member.summary: Adds an option button (also known as radio button) group to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the option button group to add.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddSeparator
member.summary: Adds a separator to the dialog, allowing a visual separation of controls.
member.param: The control ID of the separator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.AddText
member.summary: Adds text content to the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the text to add.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.EnableOpenDropDown
member.summary: Enables a drop-down list on the Open or Save button in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the drop-down list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.EndVisualGroup
member.summary: Stops the addition of elements to a visual group in the dialog.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.GetCheckButtonState
member.summary: Gets the current state of a check button (check box) in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the check box.
The address of a BOOL value that indicates whether the box is checked. TRUE means checked; FALSE, unchecked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.GetControlItemState
member.summary: Gets the current state of an item in a container control found in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control.
The ID of the item.
A pointer to a variable that receives one of more values from the CDCONTROLSTATE enumeration that indicate the current state of the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.GetControlState
member.summary: Gets the current visibility and enabled states of a given control.
member.param: The ID of the control in question.
A pointer to a variable that receives one or more values from the CDCONTROLSTATE enumeration that indicate the current state of the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.GetEditBoxText
member.summary: Gets the current text in an edit box control.
member.param: The ID of the edit box.
The address of a pointer to a buffer that receives the text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.GetSelectedControlItem
member.summary: Gets a particular item from specified container controls in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control.
The ID of the item that the user selected in the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.MakeProminent
member.summary: Places a control in the dialog so that it stands out compared to other added controls.
member.param: The ID of the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.RemoveAllControlItems
member.summary: Not implemented.
member.param: The ID of the container control from which to remove the items.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.RemoveControlItem
member.summary: Removes an item from a container control in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control from which the item is to be removed.
The ID of the item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetCheckButtonState
member.summary: Sets the state of a check button (check box) in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the check box.
A BOOL value that indicates whether the box is checked. TRUE means checked; FALSE, unchecked.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetControlItemState
member.summary: Sets the current state of an item in a container control found in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control.
The ID of the item.
One or more values from the CDCONTROLSTATE enumeration that indicate the new state of the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetControlItemText
member.summary: Sets the text of a control item. For example, the text that accompanies a radio button or an item in a menu.
member.param: The ID of the container control.
The ID of the item.
A pointer to a null-terminated buffer that contains a Unicode string with the text.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetControlLabel
member.summary: Sets the text associated with a control, such as button text or an edit box label.
member.param: The ID of the control whose text is to be changed.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetControlState
member.summary: Sets the current visibility and enabled states of a given control.
member.param: The ID of the control in question.
One or more values from the CDCONTROLSTATE enumeration that indicate the current state of the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetEditBoxText
member.summary: Sets the text in an edit box control found in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the edit box.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the text as a null-terminated Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.SetSelectedControlItem
member.summary: Sets the selected state of a particular item in an option button group or a combo box found in the dialog.
member.param: The ID of the container control.
The ID of the item to display as selected in the control.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize.StartVisualGroup
member.summary: Declares a visual group in the dialog. Subsequent calls to any "add" method add those elements to this group.
member.param: The ID of the visual group.
A pointer to a buffer that contains text, as a null-terminated Unicode string, that appears next to the visual group.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileDialogCustomize
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application to add controls to a common file dialog.
